amendment.description: To strike the requirement that the Commander of the United States Transportation Command be a member of the Board of Visitors to the United States Merchant Marine Academy and that a substitute member of the Board be an officer of the United States Transportation Command.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3442 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3442 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Boozman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3442 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3442 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Boozman.
